pageContext.claim: “[Soleimani] was a terrorist. He was a -- so designated by President Obama, as you know. And he wasn't even supposed to be outside of his own country; he was. So, right there.”
pageContext.analysis: Politifact reported Soleimani was first designated a terrorist by George W. Bush. Obama escalated this designation to a higher tier, which made it more difficult for him to travel or conduct financial transaction, but this is different than being barred from travel.
